subject: Fwd: Order #SSN4784 confirmed - order status - delivery
description_text:
Dear support team,

Would you please be so kind and provide me the local tracking number for the parcel?

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,

Fabio Fiorda

conversations.body_text: 你好，法比奥·菲奥达，  您的订单原计划从我们的德国仓库发货，但由于运输延误，货物到达时间晚于预期。目前货物已抵达仓库，我们正在进行入库处理并安排DHL快递发货。我们将于明日提供运单号。

Dear customer support,

Thanks for the prompt answer!

I’m looking forward to my new pedals. :)

Best regards,

Fabio Fiorda




> Am 22.12.2025 um 12:18 schrieb service@simsonn.com:
> 
> 你好，法比奥·菲奥达，
> 
> 您的订单原计划从我们的德国仓库发货，但由于运输延误，货物到达时间晚于预期。目前货物已抵达仓库，我们正在进行入库处理并安排DHL快递发货。我们将于明日提供运单号。
你好，法比奥·菲奥达， 非常感谢您的支持。

Dear customer service,

I haven’t received any tracking code from you so far for the DHL Express delivery as you promised the day before.
Still waiting for delivery. That`s quite disappointing.

Best regards,

Fabio




> Am 22.12.2025 um 13:52 schrieb service@simsonn.com:
> 
> 你好，法比奥·菲奥达，
> 非常感谢您的支持。
> 
> 
> 
>

Hi Fabio Fiorda,    We apologize for not updating your shipping notification in a timely manner. Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=00340434776544040924

Dear support team,

As you know I’ve ordered the complete Pedal Pro X Ultra with the Base Plate and the Haptics. The Pedals and the Base Plate have just arrived via DHL but the Haptics are missing!

I supposed it would be only one package? But that’s not the case. Could you please tell me when the Haptics which I ordered will arrive to complete my order?

Thanks in advance!

￼

Best regards,

Fabio

Dear support team,

As you know I’ve ordered the complete Pedal Pro X Ultra with the Base Plate and the Haptics. The Pedals and the Base Plate have just arrived via DHL but the Haptics are missing!

I supposed it would be only one package? But that’s not the case. Could you please tell me when the Haptics which I ordered will arrive to complete my order?
Please be so kind and provide me the tracking code for the Haptic parcel.

Thanks in advance!

￼

Best regards,

Fabio

￼￼￼

Dear customer support team,

I unpacked the 2 articles you delivered out of 3 ordered and I’m disappointed about the quality of the products. There are several small scratches on the surface.

The 3rd article from my order wasn’t included in the delivered package „ Haptics“ and are still missing. I’m quite disappointed because I ordered and already paid everything.

Therefore I want to return the 2 articles you have send me so far. Please be so kind and provide me a pre-paid return label for your return address you show on your homepage:

Simsonn
Suite 9090, 61 Bridge Street,
Kington, Herefordshire, HR5 3DJ, 
United Kingdom

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,,

Fabio Fiorda

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,

hiermit mache ich von meinem Widerrufsrecht gebrauch und möchte die Artikel I’m Rahmen der von Ihnen eingeräumten 30 Tage Widerrufsrecht zurücksenden, bitte senden Sie mir ein Retourenlabel zu oder bestätigen mir die Rücksendeadresse.

————————————— 
Dear Customer Service,

due to the quality issues (multiple scratches on the articles from manufacturing, flex of the base plate and the pedals itself) I want to return the articles.

Please be so kind to send me a pre-paid return label or at least confirm the return address: 

Simsonn
Suite 9090, 61 Bridge Street,
Kington, Herefordshire, HR5 3DJ, 
United Kingdom

Thanks in advance.

Best regards,
Fabio

Hi Fabio Fiorda,    Sorry for the delayed response—we just wrapped up our holiday break. Here's another link for your shipment tracking.  https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=JSELY1513627714YQ  The Haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeks—this product is incredibly popular. We sincerely apologize for the delay.     Additionally, could you please provide some video footage demonstrating the product's defects? We will resolve this for you, so please don't worry.

Hi support team,

Thanks for the reply to my request and a happy new year by the way. 

I already demounted the pedals from my rig. So I can’t provide any videos yet. They are ready to ship back. To be honest I’m really disappointed about the base plate and pedals itself (build quality and product usability). Sorry to cause this inconvenience regarding my order.

But I want to return everything - the whole set I bought. I totally understand that at this price point - you are offering them - you can’t expect "simucube product level quality" but it’s still a huge amount of money.
I don’t want to publish any bad reviews but they are not as I expected from the description on your homepage and how some YouTuber have reviewed them.

So I would really appreciate if we could agree on a return of the whole product set and if you could provide me a return label, please. 
Otherwise a significant discount (at least 60-70%) on the total purchase amount could be a secondary solution and I will try to use the pedals mounted on a thicker new base plate (which I have to buy for mounting the pedals, because it’s not possible to mount the pedals directly to the rig) for a transition period (but I really prefer the return). 

Thanks in advance for your understanding !



Attached you find some pictures I took when I unboxed the base plate and the resting plate. The base plate is practically not usable and that’s very annoying.
Due to the extrem thin surface of the mounting plate you have screws and bolts under it and I scratched my rig and there is massive flex by using it on the rig. 
Unfortunately it was not possible to fix the screws directly through the base plate into the rig due to the non fitting mounting points on the base plate.

￼￼￼￼￼


—————————————— below you will find pictures of the damage on my rig due to the base plate and screws under it:


￼￼





Best regards,

Fabio Fiorda
